metadata.title: ADDITIONAL FILE 4: Comparison of survivors and non-survivors

body_text.text: Static compliance of the respiratory system was calculated as tidal volume (mL) divided by difference between peak inspiratory pressure (cm H 2 O) and positive end-expiratory pressure (cm H 2 O). 4 The corrected expiratory volume per minute was calculated as the measured minute ventilation (L/min) multiplied by the arterial partial pressure of carbon dioxide (mm Hg) divided by 40 mm Hg.

BIBREF0.title: Prediction of creatinine clearance from serum creatinine

TABREF0.text: Immunocompromised state included haematological malignancies, solid tumours, solid organ transplantation, high-dose or long-term corticosteroid or other immunosuppressive therapy or human immunodeficiency virus infection.Group 1: Primary lung failure, including bacterial, viral, fungal or aspiration pneumonia; group 2: Extra-pulmonary sepsis with secondary lung injury; group 3: Multiple trauma with ARDS; group 4: Other pathologies, including near drowning, chronic lung diseases such as lung fibrosis and lung transplantation.
